resources.string: This application was developed by an independent developer named Awais Hammouda, twenty years old. There is no official sponsor or specific company
Was assisted in a small circle at the University Translators will be mentioned in the event of translation in later versions
This is a product that uses a lot of open source software if you are interested you can see it
Do you have any comments? We want to know your opinion, but please do not share any sensitive information. Do you have any legal questions or concerns? You can ask for help or support
